feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Don't delete attachments directly from the frontend by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13479
  • Search filter operators dont have options for some types by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13454
  • Update external types by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13504
  • Refetching existing tables with override column schemas by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13499
  • Remove addcolumn api param by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13500
  • Search type updates by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13507
  • Remove disabling no-unused-vars eslint comments by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13506
  • Fix issue where automation meta fields were being overridden by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13458
  • Fix changing column type by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13512
  • [Fix] Datasource plus schema updates issues by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13509

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.6...2.23.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Prevent issues with dev:docker without submodules by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13517
  • Fix displaying user autocolums edition by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13514
  • Add search.spec.ts tests for FieldType.BIGINT and some additional range query tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13503
  • Allow a displayName to be passed when creating admin user by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13516

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.7...2.23.8

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • MSSQL schema conflicts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13519

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.8...2.23.9

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Restore render blocker around client apps until data is ready by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13513
  • Fix relationships disappearing by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13526

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.9...2.23.10

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Console.error lint rule by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13448
  • Fix crashing when swapping certain conditional UI settings by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13490
  • Quiet option for grid blocks (new table component) by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13427
  • [Added] PREMIUM_PLUS_TRIAL type by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13530
  • Fix for onEmptyFilter getting stuck on internal datasource filters. by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13529
  • Fix docker-compose/docker compose error in Budibase CLI by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13540
  • Fix readable/runtime conversion with helpers by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13531

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.10...2.23.11
